name: Washington Heights Banks
description: Steep streets and concrete banks in the Heights. Raw street skating with amazing hill bombs.
history: Uptown street spots that have been session'd by local crews for years. Less documented than downtown spots.
bestTimes: Afternoons. Traffic is lighter on weekends.
transitDirections: A/C to 168th St or 1 to 168th St.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include banks, ledges, stairs, gaps. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Washington Heights. Uptown street spots that have been session'd by local crews for years. Less documented than downtown spots.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: A/C to 168th St or 1 to 168th St.. Afternoons. Traffic is lighter on weekends.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot â€” be respectful of the space and watch for security.
